mapper.select: select Product.productId, productName, thumbnailImageUrl, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review from Product ORDER BY RAND()

select Product.productId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review, TIMESTAMP(OL.updatedAt) date from Product left join Review R on Product.productId = R.productId inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId left join OrderList OL on R.orderListId = OL.orderListId group by Product.productId ORDER BY date DESC
select Product.productId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, TIMESTAMP (Product.createdAt) as date from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId ORDER BY date DESC

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId ORDER BY RAND()

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where categoryId = #{categoryId}

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where productName like '%${word}%' or makerName like '%${word}%'

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, makerName, productName, thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select COUNT(distinct orderListId) from OrderList inner join Cart C on OrderList.cartId = C.cartId inner join SmallCart SC on C.cartId = SC.cartId inner join OrderDetail OD on SC.smallCartId = OD.smallCartId inner join Product P on OD.productId = #{productId} where OD.productId = P.productId) as orderCount, deliveryTip, tipFreeMin, amount, productInfo from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.productId = #{productId}

select R.reviewId, U.userId, userName, R.updatedAt updateDate, profileImageUrl, star, R.content, (select group_concat(distinct ProductOption.content separator ' ') from ProductOption inner join OrderDetail OD on ProductOption.productOptionId = OD.productOptionId inner join Review R on OD.productId = R.productId where R.productId = 1) as productOption from Review R inner join OrderList OL on R.orderListId = OL.orderListId inner join Cart C on OL.cartId = C.cartId inner join User U on C.userId = U.userId where R.productId = #{productId}

select Product.makerId, makerProfileImageUrl, makerName, IFNULL((select AVG(star) from OrderList OL inner join Review on Review.orderListId = OL.orderListId inner join Cart C on OL.cartId = C.cartId inner join SmallCart SC on C.cartId = SC.cartId inner join OrderDetail OD on SC.smallCartId = OD.smallCartId inner join Product P on OD.productId = P.productId inner join Maker M on P.makerId = M.makerId where M.makerId = Product.makerId group by P.productId), 0) as star, (select Count(star) from OrderList OL inner join Review on Review.orderListId = OL.orderListId inner join Cart C on OL.cartId = C.cartId inner join SmallCart SC on C.cartId = SC.cartId inner join OrderDetail OD on SC.smallCartId = OD.smallCartId inner join Product P on OD.productId = P.productId inner join Maker M on P.makerId = M.makerId where M.makerId = Product.makerId group by P.productId) as reviewCount, (select Count(likeListId) from LikeList inner join Product P on LikeList.productId = P.productId inner join Maker M on P.makerId = M.makerId where M.makerId = Product.makerId) as likeCount, (select Count(followId) from Follow where makerId = Product.makerId) as followCount, (select Count(supportId) from Support where makerId = Product.makerId) as supportCount, M.profileDetail from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.productId = #{productId}
